mapper.sql: SELECT f.id, f.user_id, f.source, f.follow_user_id, f.create_time, u.uuid, u.avatar, u.nick_name, (select IF(count(1)>0,1,0) from huomai_user_follow where user_id = #{bo.curUserId}) as attend_flag, (select IF(count(1)>0,1,0) from huomai_user_follow where follow_user_id = #{bo.curUserId}) as follow_flag FROM huomai_user_follow f LEFT JOIN huomai_user u on f.follow_user_id = u.user_id
